org.apache.fop.svg
Class AbstractFOPTranscoder.FOPErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.fop.svg.AbstractFOPTranscoder.FOPErrorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.batik.transcoder.ErrorHandler
Enclosing class:
AbstractFOPTranscoder
protected class AbstractFOPTranscoder.FOPErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.batik.transcoder.ErrorHandler

This is the default transcoder error handler for FOP. It logs error to an Commons Logger instead of to System.out. The remaining behaviour is the same as Batik's DefaultErrorHandler.
